txt.en: Inspect the fallen Rohirrim
Talk to Gísil
You see more footprints leading into the distance
You see another footprint in the distance, as well as several Orc-tracks....
As you follow the trail, you spot darkened blood on the ground. Perhaps an Orc was slain nearby?
The Orcs have thoroughly ravaged this croft. It is possible that some of the crofters have escaped this grisly fate and fled to Garsfeld or Snowbourn.
Even before the body in the distance catches your eye, you can tell that this is not the blood of an Orc
This Rohirrim and his steed were slain by Orcs. Gísil will want to know of this
You have come across no signs of the Rohirrim aside from Sigeric. You should scout the road to see if any Rohirrim were able to escape the Orc-assault.

Gisil sighs heavily.

'So, even the Riders could not escape. What a grim end for my folk. Thank you for telling me, as horrid as the truth is.

'I will not allow the crofters to come to such a terrible end. We must depart now or risk losing everything.'
You have found a trail of footprints off the side of the road south to Snowbourn.\n\nYou should follow the footprints and discover if anyone else escaped the sacking of the croft.
You have found a trail of footprints off the side of the road south to Snowbourn.\n\nYou should follow the footprints and discover if anyone else escaped the sacking of the croft.
You have found a trail of footprints off the side of the road south to Snowbourn.\n\nYou should follow the footprints and discover if anyone else escaped the sacking of the croft.
At the end of the trail, you have found a patch of blood-stained grass.\n\nYou should examine the blood to determine its source.
Follow the trail of footprints off the road to Snowbourn
You have found a Rohirrim and his steed slain at the end of the trail.\n\nYou should inspect the warrior's wounds to confirm your suspicions about his attackers.
Follow the trail of footprints off the road to Snowbourn
Follow the trail of footprints up the hill
Gísil is in the Mead Hall of Garsfeld.\n\nYou should bring news of what you have found to Gísil.
Follow the footprints further up the hill
No Survivors
Investigate the nearby blood-stained grass
